q: SELECT a/${path} FROM EHR e[ehr_id/value='${ehr_id}'] CONTAINS COMPOSITION c[openEHR-EHR-COMPOSITION.test_all_types.v1] CONTAINS SECTION s[openEHR-EHR-SECTION.test_all_types.v1] CONTAINS ACTION a[openEHR-EHR-ACTION.test_all_types.v1] WHERE (c/uid/value = '${c_uid}' AND a/language/terminology_id/value = 'ISO_639-1')
